ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:31:49 [Issue ID 4000-171555] urn:comicvine:4000-171555 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:42:18. [Issue ID 675564]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Zombie Universe’s Wolverine is transported to Earth Z and his story picks up two years after the previous issue. He attacks Kitty Pryde but the Zombie Universe’s Spider-Man shows up to rescue her. He is continuing to try to find a way to control The Hunger and he needs blood from the Earth Z Wolverine to finalize it. The Earth Z Wolverine shows up and manages to destroy the zombie Wolverine and everyone he has turned to a zombie. The Zombie Universe’s Spider-Man says that he now knows how to help others control The Hunger and he sets out to find the other zombies to help them.
ComicInfo.Title: Snikt Goes Splat!
